formattedAddress: 30 Central Park S #2b, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S #2b, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Pantaleo is the best doctor ever! Totally supportive during my Invisalign treatment (which produced amazing results in only a few months), and I have kind of fallen in love with the staff.  Even billing and the lady who makes me floss! This office is fully equipped to provide the best of modern dental services. Flexible scheduling, awesome reminder system, great view - I could go on, but suffice to say that I look forward to going to the dentist now. Crazy, right?

text.text: Dr. Pantaleo is the best doctor ever! Totally supportive during my Invisalign treatment (which produced amazing results in only a few months), and I have kind of fallen in love with the staff.  Even billing and the lady who makes me floss! This office is fully equipped to provide the best of modern dental services. Flexible scheduling, awesome reminder system, great view - I could go on, but suffice to say that I look forward to going to the dentist now. Crazy, right?

originalText.text:
My review is negative largely due to the lack of transparency in pricing I experienced at Dr. Pantaleo's office. After a follow up appointment with him, he recommended that I get my 9 past cavities touched up. Following his recommendation, I easily agreed and went forward with the procedure. Fast forward an hour later, I was hit with a $4000 bill, $3000 even with my insurance.

I naturally experienced immense disappointment as a patient. It's very easy to see with a quick google search how grossly the practice overcharges for a simple cavity touch up.

The way they treat patients without true transparency regarding the treatments they recommend makes me call into question everything about their practice. I am now skeptical of all the medical advice given to me, the validity of my cleanings and my check ups. The way by which I have been taken advantage of makes me fear for future patients who are not as fortunate as I am to be able to financially handle this kind of scam. I truly hope they reflect on what has happened here and make changes moving forward, as blindsiding people with huge bills for a one hour appointment is in no world acceptable.

originalText.text: Dr. Pantaleo is the best. I had a bad broken tooth that he fixed right up with no pain. Normally I am not a fan of Dentists but i felt no pain ashe worked some serious magic on my teeth. Now I am a loyal patient. If anyone ever asks me to recommend a dentist I immediately drop his name. Great dentist and great guy too

originalText.text: I love this practice, I've been going for 4 years and they have been consistently delivering A+ service. Cleanings are always gentile and through and Dr. Pantaleo is very knowledgeable and I've always had a great experience and have refereed other people who have always had great things to say.
